header_text: You want your family to have good educational opportunities. You want your kids to be able to attend good colleges but understand that this comes with a high price tag.

elements.text: You want your family to have good educational opportunities. You want your grandkids to be able to attend good colleges but understand that this comes with a high price tag. You wonder if you should pitch in and help with their college...
